summary: This document appears to be a public notice or cover page from the United States v. Jeffrey Epstein criminal case, providing contact information for potential victims or witnesses to call the FBI. It indicates an ongoing federal criminal prosecution against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The named defendant in the federal criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB). The document seeks information from his alleged victims.

events.title: Federal Criminal Case Filed Against Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The United States government filed criminal charges against Jeffrey Epstein, designated as case number 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

keyFacts: The document is related to the federal criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).
The FBI is actively seeking information from individuals who believe they were victims of Jeffrey Epstein or have information about the allegations in the indictment.
A public hotline (1-800-Call-FBI) has been established for victims or informants to contact the authorities.
